title: nf-core/molkart pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

nuclear_image.errorMessage: Nuclear image must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.tif' or '.tiff'

spot_table.errorMessage: Spot table must be provided, has to have shape x,y,z,gene with sep = '	', cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.txt'

membrane_image.errorMessage: Membrane image is optional, and cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.tif' or '.tiff'
